metadata.description:
A journey to the past that brings us full circle into the present and towards the future. Once considered a lost relic - this ARTIFACT has gained new life thanks to modern technology and the blockchain. The forms and colors within this piece are home - this is my birthplace, my metaverse.


The 1st holder of this token will be sent 1 of 3 'ADVENT' NFT's upon collection.

This piece includes multiple mediums of art and applications. Hand drawn designs, digitally crafted colors and textures, as well as other techniques were used to create this 1 of 1. It is accompanied by an ambient music track produced in Ableton Live 10. The holder of this NFT is granted the following license type: CC BY-SA
